content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (16, 2), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵初期は(26,26)近傍。こちら(16,2)からは南東へ広域索敵が必要。空母は安全距離を保ちつつ前進し、発艦圏22内で右下方面を扇形にカバー。ASQ1を(24,18)方面、ASQ2を(28,22)方面へ送り、往路での発見・即攻撃を狙う。空母は陸地を避けつつ(18,4)へ前進し次ターンの再発艦や位置修正の自由度を確保。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":18,"y":4},"launch_target":{"x":24,"y":18}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (24, 18) while at (18, 4).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (17, 3), en route to target (18, 4), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (18, 4), outbound toward (24, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵は(26,26)近傍想定。ASQ1は(24,18)へ向け南東斜めに索敵進行中。ASQ2でより深い右下(26〜28,24〜26)を扇状にカバーし、往路発見を狙う。空母は予定どおり(18,4)へ前進しつつ安全距離を維持。次ターン以降、敵機の帰路方向から位置推定予定。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":18,"y":4},"launch_target":{"x":28,"y":22}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (28, 22) while at (18, 5).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (18, 4), en route to target (18, 4), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (20, 8), outbound toward (24, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (18, 5), outbound toward (28, 22), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵は右下(26,26)周辺想定。ASQ1は(24,18)へ、ASQ2は(28,22)へ南東索敵中で、扇形にカバーできている。空母は安全を保ちつつ発艦圏を南東側に拡張するため更に(20,6)へ前進。次の発艦・再補給位置を確保し、敵機接触時は回避機動へ移行する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":20,"y":6},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (18, 14) while at (22, 12).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (18, 14) while at (20, 9).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (18, 14) (previously at (20, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (19, 6), en route to target (20, 6), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (22, 12), outbound toward (24, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (20, 9), outbound toward (28, 22), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵機BSQ1を(18,14)で視認。これは敵空母が北西寄りにいる兆候。敵初期(26,26)からの発艦と仮定すると、BSQ1は北西へ向かう復路/往路いずれか。こちら空母(20,6)へ前進継続で発艦圏を確保しつつ、ASQ1は予定通り(24,18)で南東扇の上辺、ASQ2は(28,22)で深部を索敵。敵機の動向で敵空母の方位を推定、発見次第攻撃へ移行。空母はまだ敵視界外と推定、無用な大幅前進は避ける。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":20,"y":6},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (17, 13) while at (22, 13).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (17, 12) while at (21, 11).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (22, 19) while at (23, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (22, 19) (previously at (23, 20)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (17, 12) (previously at (20, 14)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (20, 6), en route to target (20, 6), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (23, 16), outbound toward (22, 19), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (22, 13), outbound toward (28, 22), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母を(22,19)で捕捉。ASQ1は自動で攻撃コースへ移行済み。ASQ2は当初目標(28,22)だが、発見済みの敵空母へ誘導したいが行動中は変更不可のため、そのまま南方からの接触→往路で敵空母を視認できれば攻撃に移る見込み。敵機BSQ1は(17,12)付近でこちら空母(20,6)方向へ接近の可能性。空母は敵の反撃射線から外れるため北西へ小移動しつつ、次ターン以降の追撃用に再発艦位置を調整。被索敵リスクを抑えつつ継戦。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":18,"y":5},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

- Your squadron ASQ2: position (22, 17), outbound toward (21, 18), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母を(21,18)でASQ1/ASQ2が同時攻撃態勢。こちら空母は(18,5)で安全圏。このまま位置維持し、次の追撃や帰投受け入れのため温存。敵機BSQ1は北側(17,12)でこちらに近いが、空母視界外で脅威は限定。発艦中隊なしのため移動最小化して被発見リスクを下げる。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":18,"y":5},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"ASQ1が命中し敵空母は77HP。ASQ2が追撃中。こちら空母は安全圏を維持しつつ敵の反撃想定進路から少し離隔して受け入れ位置を調整。敵機BSQ1は北側だが接触なし。ASQ1は帰投、ASQ2の攻撃後の帰還受け入れを優先。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":4},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"敵空母は(21,18)付近で足止め中、HP51。こちら両隊とも帰投中で再攻撃の好機。空母は受け入れつつ次発艦で即再攻撃できる位置へ微調整。敵機接近情報なし、しかし敵の反撃に備え空母は過度に前進しない。ASQ1/2を回収後、同座標へ波状攻撃を計画。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":4},"launch_target":null}}
